1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Meet the Team

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The Menzies Motorsports crew works together 24/7 in order to win championships time and time again. Hang out with Bryce Menzies and the team as they tackle challenges, race go-karts, and have some fun on Fremont Street in Las Vegas.

3.title: Victory at The Mint 400

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: The Menzies Motorsports team competes in The Mint 400, a gritty 400-mile (640km) off-road race. Afterwards, Bryce thinks teammate Jack needs to work on his dance moves, so he sets up a lesson with Ronnie from hip-hop band Jabbawockeez.

4.title: Skydives and Freefalls

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Bryce helps teammate Jack get over his fear of heights by taking him indoor skydiving in Las Vegas. Upping the stakes, Bryce calls on the Red Bull Air Force to help them jump out of an actual plane. Will Jack be able to handle the pressure?

5.title: Stormy Weather at X Games

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Before the race, the crew enjoys the Spanish culture and nightlife. When a storm rolls in and turns the course into a mud bog, Bryce wonders if he'll get to race at all.

6.title: Back to Back Racing

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: In the midst of a busy racing schedule, Bryce and the crew head out to Tennessee to race some rallycross at Bristol. Once the race in Bristol is over, the crew hops on a plane to catch another race at the Chicagoland Speedway.

7.title: Keep It on the Track

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Bryce and his crew head to Crandon, Wisconsin, USA, for the TORC Pro 2 race. They check out the annual Labor Day parade and teammate Jack gets behind the wheel of Bryce's old buggie for the first time.

8.title: Journey to the Baja 1000

episode of.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Bryce looks back on his season and gets in the zone for the biggest race of his life: the Baja 1000. After the final pit meeting with his crew, Bryce puts on his game face and tackles the race head on.

imdb.title: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies
akas: Driving Dirty w/ Bryce Menzies (United States)
plot: Jump into the passenger seat in Drivin' Dirty with professional off-road racer, Bryce Menzies. Bryce and his crew kick it into gear as they rally through off-roading races and the X-Games on their way to the Baja 1000.::Anonymous
synopsis: Follow off-road racing champion Bryce Menzies as he sets his sights on his first Baja 1000 title. Go behind the scenes at Menzies Motorsports, as well as Bryce's travels, trials, and triumphs as he competes in the SCORE desert racing, TORC short-course racing and Global RallyCross competition.
